objects.text:
• Trendy mint green perfect for spring
• Cropped design with elastic waistband
• Versatile piece for everyday fashion

product_details.name: Chic Mint Cropped Bomber Jacket - Perfect Spring Essential
product_details.description:
• Trendy mint green color perfect for spring/summer fashion
• Cropped length design for a modern, stylish silhouette
• Elastic gathered waistband for a flattering fit
• Full-length zipper front closure for easy wear
• Comfortable hooded design with drawstrings
• Durable yet lightweight material ideal for layering
• Relaxed shoulders and roomy sleeves for unrestricted movement
• Versatile piece that pairs well with high-waisted bottoms
• Perfect blend of casual comfort and fashion-forward style
• Available in sizes XS to XL
• Easy-care fabric suitable for machine washing
• Ideal for casual outings, light workouts, or everyday wear

banner_details:
This spring-themed banner design features a clean and fresh composition aimed at promoting a seasonal fashion item. The layout is split vertically, with the left half reserved for catchy text content and the right half showcasing the product image. The focal point is the stylish model wearing a mint green cropped bomber jacket ("product_image"), accompanied by vibrant and bold section headings ("heading"), a soft pastel subheading motif ("tagline"), and a brief promotional phrase ("subheading"). Bulleted highlights ("description") offer product benefits, followed by a minimalist pricing section ("price_label" and "price"). A call-to-action button ("cta_button" with text "cta") ensures user engagement. Background gradients and subtle decorative circles add depth and elegance.

**Color Palette:**
- **Mint Green:** #B7DFD3, #9CCFC0 (accents and primary branding)
- **Forest Green:** #235D4C (text and key highlights)
- **Off White:** #F9F3F3, #E8F4F1 (background gradient)
- **White:** #FFFFFF (CTA text)
product_color: The product image features a soft pastel mint green hoodie (Hex: #C3EBDD), which gives a calm, fresh, and youthful vibe. The subtle color blends smoothly across the fabric, with gentle highlights created by natural lighting on the curves and folds, enhancing its texture while preserving a clean, minimal aesthetic. The zipper and drawstrings stay within the mint palette, maintaining visual consistency. The dark charcoal black skirt (Hex: #2B2B2B) provides a strong contrast, highlighting the pastel upper wear and drawing attention to it. An ideal advertisement banner can use complementary muted pastels like soft gray (#E0E0E0) or peach beige (#F9E4D4) to maintain harmony.
